title: I lost my device, but i found it fortunately. However, i forgot what password i used to lock it. I
content:
I lost my device, but i found it fortunately.  However,  i forgot what password i used to lock it. I know my Google password, but I must have used a different one to lock it. Now I have 1 attempt left before it's erased.  Any help is much appreciated. 
 I'm using an Lg L2
